text: Stefan Olsson was the two-time defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Shingo Kunieda. Gustavo Fernández won the title, defeating Kunieda in the final, 4–6, 6–3, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==References== *WC Men's Singles Men's Wheelchair Singles Category:Wimbledon Championship by year – Wheelchair Men's Singles
title: 2019 Wimbledon Championships – Wheelchair Men's Singles
